title: 17-year-old injured in shooting on Sunset Avenue
content:
ROCKFORD, Ill. (WIFR) – A teen has been taken to the hospital after a shooting in the 400 block of North Sunset Avenue.
According to Rockford Police, officers responded to a shots fired call around 3:00 p.m. Police say when they arrived they found that a 17-year-old had been shot twice in the leg. The teenager was taken to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Police have not released any possible suspect descriptions. Anyone with information is asked to call Rockford Police.
